channel.title: Good base source for 2006 remake?
channel.description:
I want a base source that has either:
*(most preferred but isnt happening)
[ul][li]All npcs spawned in right spot from 2006[/li] [li]Full skills[/li] [li]All 2006 items[/li][/ul]
Dont care about rest Ide figure it out
**(realistic)
[ul][li]Most skills except skills involving npcs e.g. slayer, thieving, farming[/li] [li]Most items, no customs or items from 2006+[/li][/ul]
*** This would just be the hardest and Im not sure if I could make a 2006 remake from a blank source, but I would try. I would just want recomendations between Hyperion, or any other blank sources, and where to get a client to go with them, Ty.

This would just be the hardest and Im not sure if I could make a 2006 remake from a blank source, but I would try. I would just want recomendations between Hyperion, or any other blank sources, and where to get a client to go with them, Ty.
